content.text: I am looking for some new music to listen to! What do you like to listen to?
I like to listen to all kinds of music. My favorite band is the Beatles. I also like classical music.
The Beatles are great! I also like classical music. I love listening to Mozart.
I love Mozart too! I also love listening to Beethoven.
I have never listened to Beethoven. I will have to give him a try!
I will! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play the guitar. I also like to play the piano.
I would love to learn how to play the piano. I just do not have the time to learn.
You should learn! It is a lot of fun!
I will! I will have to find a time to take lessons.
That is great! I hope you have fun!
